description: It's time for some more three-way action. Today we'll be showing off Richard Cynderblock, the slim skateboarder, Dylan McLovin, the young personal trainer and Slade, the oldest of the trio.Dylan was interrupted by Richard skateboarding around the house naked. When Richard rolled over to his friend, Dylan McLovin figured there was only one thing to do to teach him a lesson...suck his cock!If that wasn't enough, Slade stumbled upon this punishment session and decided to join in. He and Dylan really show Richard that skateboarding in the house is a big no-no.In the end, Slade is the one that's covered in cum, and Richard skateboards off to his room.Enjoy!
title: More Three-way Action
